name: Charge SRD | Power Your Storytelling
description:
Charge SRD

Charge SRD a condensed version of Charge RPG, the free, open and generic TTRPG system.

Powered By Charge games are narrative tabletop role-playing games about groups of characters struggling to achieve their goals, but pushing themselves to get there.

The SRD

This document follows a certain format that you can use as a base framework for your game.

You copy/paste it, and just fill-in the gaps. You can also tear-it down to make something completely different!

Powered By Charge

The Charge SRD is released under Creative Commons Attribution CC-BY.

So if you want to make your own game using Charge, you just need to include the following attribution text in your game.
